knimeNode.name: Bruker Project Explorer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Find all Bruker project in folder and subfolder.

fullDescription.intro: This node selects all Bruker 1H-1D-NMR-experiments contained in the selected folder and its subfolders. Only the experiment with the lowest experiment number per subfolder will be selected (excluding e.g. pulse optimizing and 2D-experiments).
fullDescription.option: Location of the main folder which includes all data sets in different subfolders.
FIDs or 1r can be selected and loaded. If is selected Fid, it will be loaded raw unprocessed signal. if is selected 1r it will be loaded processed NMR spectrum
If it is checked, it will be loaded only measurement which has the lowest number from project.
